Deleting your cache directory will cause: Deleting your cache directory will cause you to lose some settings. Do not delete your cache directory unless instructed to do so by a Streamlabs staff member
Confirm stream title and game before goi: Confirm stream title and game before going live
Enable reporting additional information: Enable reporting additional information on a crash (requires restart)
Your cache directory has been successful: Your cache directory has been successfully uploaded.  The file name %{file} has been copied to your clipboard.
Stream Labels session has been successfu: Stream Labels session has been successfully restarted!
This action will restart the application: This action will restart the application. Continue?
Show confirmation dialog when starting s: Show confirmation dialog when starting streams
Show confirmation dialog when stopping s: Show confirmation dialog when stopping streams
Do not back up my media files in the clo: Do not back up my media files in the cloud (requires app restart)
Single click selects group. Double click: Single click selects group. Double click selects item
Double click selects group. Single click: Double click selects group. Single click selects item
Streaming to a custom ingest is advanced: Streaming to a custom ingest is advanced functionality. Some features may stop working as expected
You can not change these settings when y: You can not change these settings when you're live
This feature is intended for overlay des: This feature is intended for overlay designers to export their work for our Theme Store. Not all sources will be exported, use at your own risk.
Change the look of Streamlabs Desktop wi: Change the look of Streamlabs Desktop with Prime
Maximum custom destinations has been add: Maximum custom destinations has been added
The Virtual Webcam plugin needs to be up: The Virtual Webcam plugin needs to be updated before it can be started. This requires administrator privileges.
Virtual Webcam requires administrator pr: Virtual Webcam requires administrator privileges to be installed on your system.
If the virtual webcam does not appear in: If the virtual webcam does not appear in other applications, you may need to restart your computer.
Virtual Webcam allows you to display you: Virtual Webcam allows you to display your scenes from Streamlabs Desktop in video conferencing software. Streamlabs Desktop will appear as a Webcam that can be selected in most video conferencing apps.
Uninstalling Virtual Webcam will remove: Uninstalling Virtual Webcam will remove it as a device option in other applications.
The diagnostic report is an automaticall: The diagnostic report is an automatically generated report that contains information about your system and configuration. Clicking the upload button below will generate and securely transmit a diagnostic report to the Streamlabs team.
There was an error uploading the diagnos: There was an error uploading the diagnostic report. Please try again, and let the Streamlabs Streamer Success team know if the issue persists.
The diagnostic report was securely uploa: The diagnostic report was securely uploaded, and the Report ID below has been copied to your clipboard. Please provide the Report ID to the Streamlabs Streamer Success Team.
Show announcements for new Streamlabs fe: Show announcements for new Streamlabs features and products
Disable live streaming features (Recordi: Disable live streaming features (Recording Only mode)
